original: Borgmark, Carl August, häradsskrivare, Sölvesborg, f. 21/11/94 i Karlskrona. G. 26 m. Claris Petersson. — Stud:ex. 13. Anst. h. flott, förvalt-n:dir. i Karlskr. 13, å kronouppb kont. där 14-18, å Blek. 1. landskont. 18-46, här:’skrdv. 46, tax:kO’nis. 47. OTdf. i ok tax:ndr 26-46, rev. i södra Smål. m. fl. bost :kreditfören. 34-46.
translated: Borgmark, Carl August, district clerk, Sölvesborg, b. 21/11/94 in Karlskrona. Married on 26 with Claris Petersson. — Passed the final exam in 1913. Employed in the navy administration in Karlskrona from 1913, then at the county tax office there from 1914-1918, at the country's first national tax office from 1918-1946, district clerk from 1946 and tax consultant from 1947. Member of the National Audit Office in Stockholm from 1926-1946, auditor in southern Småland with several home credit unions from 1934-1946.
